subject: We ready to get back to business?
author: Frank Ratka
full_text:
--0-1351446631-1195226943=:15436
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Alright, I think most all the regulars got to put in their two cents and vent a little. Except for Misty but she don't get off work till later. LOL Lets not let this affect our purpose or be distracted any further. We have lots of work to do and wallowing in the negative is going to effect our contact fields. Personally, I am putting my trust in those that guide us and will let them handle it. I'm done!

Best Regards,

Frank R.
